results.title: Simvastatin alleviates the progression of periapical lesions by modulating autophagy and apoptosis in osteoblasts.
results.text_hl: This study elucidated the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on autophagy/apoptosis in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0409 @@@MC3T3E1@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ osteoblastic cells and also the significance of this action on the progression of induced @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Periapical_Periodontitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010485 @@@apical periodontitis@@@.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on kinetics of osteoprotegrin/receptor activator nuclear kappa B Ligand mRNA expression in periapical lesions.
results.text_hl: AIM: To evaluate the therapeutic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Periapical_Periodontitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010485 @@@apical periodontitis@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ by assessing the osteoblast production of @GENE_TNFSF11 @GENE_117516 @@@receptor activator of nuclear factor-Kappa B Ligand@@@ (@GENE_TNFSF11 @GENE_117516 @@@RANKL@@@) and @GENE_TNFRSF11B @GENE_25341 @@@Osteoprotegerin@@@ (@GENE_TNFRSF11B @GENE_25341 @@@OPG@@@) cytokines that are essential for @DISEASE_Bone_Resorption @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@.
